price: Je! Huyo hakuwa ni Muweza wa kufufua wafu?
arabic: أَلَيۡسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحۡـِۧيَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ
footnotes: Je! Huyo Muumba wa mwanzo aliye fanya yote haya, basi si muweza wa kuwahuisha maiti baada ya kuyakusanya mafupa yao?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: alaysa dhālika biqādirin ʿalā an yuḥ'yiya al-mawtā
